function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in population size making it challenging to monitor the emergence of infections within a community from wastewater","Impact":"Difficulty in distinguishing whether a pathogen in wastewater came from visitors or the community, leading to potential disease emergence","Mitigation":"Improved surveillance techniques and data analysis to account for transient population in catchment areas","Technologies":"Advanced data collection and analysis, real-time monitoring systems","People":"Public health authorities, wastewater management teams","Owner":"Public health agencies, local authorities"},{"Description":"Limitations of wastewater-based epidemiology (WBE) techniques for biomarker selection","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess health of population and emerging disease trends","Mitigation":"Rigorous criteria for biomarker selection, testing, and validation","Technologies":"Advanced analytical methods, biomarker validation techniques","People":"Research scientists, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
